thread.title: Alabama Continue Work for Saturday's Matchup with Arkansas
thread.title_full: Alabama Continue Work for Saturday's Matchup with Arkansas

title: Alabama Continue Work for Saturday's Matchup with Arkansas
text:
Alabama Continue Work for Saturday's Matchup with Arkansas Tools By Alabama News Network 
Story Created: Oct 7, 2015 at 11:12 PM CDT 
Alabama and Arkansas will meet for the 26th time in series history, with the Crimson Tide owning the series advantage 15-8 (18-7 before forfeited and vacated wins). The Crimson Tide is currently on an eight-game winning streak against the Razorbacks and has won the past five matchups between the two teams inside Bryant-Denny Stadium . 
The Crimson Tide and Razorbacks are scheduled for a 6:00 p.m. CT kickoff inside Bryant-Denny Stadium with the game airing on ESPN. Brad Nessler and Todd Blackledge will work from the booth, while Holly Rowe focuses on the sidelines.
